data.meta_description: Director: Tigmanshu Dhulia; Writer: Sanjay Chauhan, Tigmanshu Dhulia; Producer: Usha Balram, Siddharth Roy Kapur, Deven Khote, Zarina Mehta, Rucha Pathak, Ajay Rai, Ronnie Screwvala; Cinematographer: Aseem Mishra; Editor: Aarti Bajaj; Cast: Irrfan Khan, Ravi Bhushan Bhartiya, Hemendra Dandotiya, Mahie Gill, Rajendra Gupta, Rajiv Gupta, Jhakkad Guru, Ashraf Ul Haq, Imran Hasnee, Zakir Hussain, Brijendra Kala, Jahangir Khan, Swapnil kiiran Kotriwar, Vipin Sharma, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Dinesh Uniyal, Sanjeeva Vatsa; Duration: 02:15:17; Aspect Ratio: 2.353:1; Hue: 55.574; Saturation: 0.127; Lightness: 0.253; Volume: 0.099; Cuts per Minute: 15.597; Summary: Paan Singh Tomar is a Hindi-language film, based on the true story of a runner employed by the Army and has won Gold medal at Indian National Games but forced to become notorious baaghi. It is directed by Tigmanshu Dhulia.
data.text:
